text: Olivier Léo Patrick Alexandre Michaud (born September 14, 1983) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey goaltender. He played one game for the Montreal Canadiens of the National Hockey League (NHL) during the 2001–02 season. ==Other websites== * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Baie-Comeau Drakkar players Category:Canadian ice hockey goaltenders Category:ECHL players Category:Hamilton Bulldogs (AHL) players Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:Shawinigan Cataractes players
title: Olivier Michaud
